mapper.select: SELECT merchant_id AS merchantId, create_time AS createTime, pay_channel AS payChannel FROM t_polymer_temp_order WHERE merchant_id = 3552758098124194 AND pay_channel = 'YONG_TONG_OCEANPAY_PAY_IN_904' LIMIT 1

select merchant_id merchantId, count(1) orderNum from t_polymer_temp_order where create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} and create_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by merchant_id order by orderNum desc
